Package humanagent

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAgent<B extends AbstractAgentBody>  
    AbstractAgentBody
    Abstract class for agent body.
    AbstractBehavior<T extends AbstractPerception,W extends AbstractProperties,B extends AbstractAgentBody>
    Provide an action for specified perceptions, properties and utility
    AbstractMover<T>
    AbstractMover decribes the abstract behavior to move on the given class.
    AbstractPerception
    Stores current perceptions in a Map of class names and a lists of objects from this class.
    AbstractProperties
    Stores attributes of an agent : home, workoffice, parameters
    AbstractSensor<B extends AbstractAgentBody>
    The frustum represents the vision of the agent, or the way agent can perceive his environment.
    AbstractUtility<P extends AbstractProperties>  
    Agent
